synopsis:
Precure's first 3D holographic event. It will be held at the DMM VR Theater in Yokohama. The event will feature 44 Precure characters (including the ones from the latest television anime Maho Girls Precure!), and will have an original story. 
The 3D holographic event does not require the use of specialized glasses or head-mounted devices. The event will run from December 23 to January 29 (with a break from December 31 to January 3), and will have seven shows each day from 10:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.

title.en: Everyone Assemble! Precure Festival Precure on Miracle Magical ☆ Stage
title.jp: Minna Atsumare! Precure Festival Precure on Miracle Magical ☆ Stage
